Hi all,

I was watching a Scott Manley video where he showed a mod that allowed other launch sites and it gave me an idea.

How about having unlockable launch sites around Kerbin? They could be unlocked by simply getting there with a kerbal or there could be certain unlock criteria to unlock them. Land an aircraft here, and return to the KSC to unlock, say.

It would give a nice reason to explore Kerbin a bit. I have a few times flown a plane long distance on Kerbin and it was always really fun. Having something to unlock for doing this would be ace.

Let me know what you think!

MJ

Id like to have this. maybe potential launch sites, runways and tracking stations could be unlocked by "surveying" particular areas with a kerbal. kinda like doing a soil sample.

transport a kerbal to a location(s), conduct the survey (would a runway fit here?), transmit your data, return to admin building, new building site available! pay construction fee.

I guess potential building sites could be identified because they would be relatively flat and far from cities and towns? working on the assumption that there will be cities and towns on kerbin by v1.0....
